Detailed Description

This class is used in TerrainHeightMap2 collisions calculations.

bool TerrainQuadTreeCell::collide ( const Vector3 &  source,
const Vector3 &  extent,
const TerrainHeightMap2 *  pOwner,
TerrainCollisionCallback *  pCallback 
) const

This function does a collision detection with this level of the quad-subtree.

Parameters:
source The start of the line-segment for collision.
extent The end of the line-segment for collision.
pOwner The owner TerrainHeightMap2.
pCallback The collision callback.
Returns:
True if a collision is found, false otherwise.

void TerrainQuadTreeCell::init ( const TerrainHeightMap2 *  map,
uint32  xOffset,
uint32  zOffset,
uint32  xSize,
uint32  zSize,
float  xMin,
float  zMin,
float  xMax,
float  zMax,
float  minCellSize 
)

This function creates a sub quad-tree in the given area.

Parameters:
map The underlying TerrainHeightMap2.
xOffset The x-offset into the TerrainHeightMap2 in terms of poles.
zOffset The y-offset into the TerrainHeightMap2 in terms of poles.
xSize The x-size into the TerrainHeightMap2 in terms of poles.
zSize The z-size into the TerrainHeightMap2 in terms of poles.
xMin The x-offset into the TerrainHeightMap2 in terms of metres.
zMin The y-offset into the TerrainHeightMap2 in terms of metres.
xMax The x-size into the TerrainHeightMap2 in terms of metres.
zMax The z-size into the TerrainHeightMap2 in terms of metres.
